sentence.Network_en: Experience teaches men craftiness. After all, you only live once!
sentence.Network_cn: 经验使人知道怎样应当油滑一些, 因为命只有一条 啊 !

sentence.Network_en: Craftiness was written on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 他脸上露出一副奸诈相.

sentence.Network_en: Indeed, craftiness in humans was a supreme trait.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 手工艺(craftiness)也是人类最重要的一个特性了.
